description:
Course Updated 22 January 2016

Why are 16,560 students wanting me to mentor them in 37 Udemy courses? 16,560 students have started learning from me since August 7th 2015. Shouldn't you find out why?

153 Positive Reviews

You are finally on the path to discover how to be Super Productive.

This course will give you actionable items so that you can plan your productive, non productive and buffer days.

Super Productive is intentionally a short course. You don't need to spend hours wading through unnecessary videos or documents.

Take this course and you will learn:

How to leverage your time

How to focus your mind and remove distractions and interruptions

How to avoid the feeling of anger and frustration of not being Super Productive

How to plan your time, actions, reactions and ideas

Not to let unnecessary ideas clutter your mind, especially when you are trying to be Super Productive

How managing your time will give you a huge boost in confidence

How to use a simple software tool to track your time to focus on productive tasks that will give you amazing transformation results

Take this course now and finally become Super Productive!
title: Super Productive - Master Time, Ideas, Actions and Reactions
